text: <!here|@here> anyone driving from office to happy hour today?
I am if someone wants to ride with me!
cool, i’ll take ya up on that if you don’t mind <@U1HKQRLMR>
also, i brought my clothes, sleeping bag etc to office today.  i’m ready to rock tomorrow!
Not at all :slightly_smiling_face:
Im so excited for you guys
What time tomorrow??
sorry marce! we’re still waiting for north to get back to us with estimations on how long its going to take them to run their legs
<@U07KCCF0V>
Based on my math.  North starts at 11:45, needs 4:15 hours (fast pace) means we need to be at exchange before 4pm.  Accordingly, a 2pm office leave time might be best.
I think there is some confusion about North getting back to us.
I can check in with Sarah.
2pm allows us 2 hours to get to exchange, i feel thats likely safe.
I’d give yourselves another hour
it can be traffic-y, hard to find parking, and not always clear where the first runner needs to be
3 hours on top of conservative running estimates <@U0260V4K1>?  im with ya but i dont wann get all crazy
Sarah had warned me about how bad the traffic can get. I just emailed her to see if she has an update on when she thinks we’ll get to the handoff point.
She had recommended getting their very early though.
it *could* be crazy, but I dont think it will be
Sounds like I'll be driving over to North for happy hour w the van if anyone wants a ride!

This is what I heard back from Sarah: I think 5pm (5:15 latest) is a good time runner 6 will be coming into Sandy but again, better to be safe so if you give Marce that number he can figure out when you want to arrive.  We will be communicating w/ Van 2 after the first few runners so you'll have better idea after 3 or 4 runners..., make sense?
<@U1HKQRLMR> <@U0ML49XU0> Either of you want a ride to the HH? I have to take the van since we’re going to decorate it. Bringing it back here after.
I was planning on heading home after and live on the west side so will probably drive separately.
Actually. <@U0ML49XU0> Let’s ride with Emily. Her and I are going to adidas tonight :smile:
perfect
